00037 cedrus::xid_device_t::xid_device_t(
00038     boost::shared_ptr<cedrus::xid_con_t> xid_con,
00039     const std::wstring &devconfig_path)
00040     : xid_con_(xid_con),
00041       product_id_(-1),
00042       model_id_(0),
00043       button_count_(8),
00044       input_name_prefix_(L"Button")
00045 {
00046     init_device(devconfig_path);
00047 }

00049 cedrus::xid_device_t::~xid_device_t(void)
00050 {
00051 }
00052 
00053 int cedrus::xid_device_t::get_xid_inquiry(
00054     const char in_command[],
00055     int expected_bytes_rec,
00056     int timeout,
00057     int delay)
00058 {
00059     int return_value = INVALID_RETURN_VALUE;
00060     char return_info[20];
00061 
00062     int bytes_returned = xid_con_->send_xid_command(
00063         in_command,
00064         0,
00065         return_info,
00066         sizeof(return_info),
00067         expected_bytes_rec,
00068         timeout,
00069         delay);
00070 
00071     if(bytes_returned > 0)
00072         return_value = atoi(return_info);
00073 
00074     return return_value;
00075 }

00077 void cedrus::xid_device_t::reset_rt_timer()
00078 {
00079     char return_info[200];
00080     xid_con_->send_xid_command(
00081         "e5", // reset rt timer Xid command
00082         2,
00083         return_info,
00084         sizeof(return_info),
00085         0);
00086 }
00087 
00088 void cedrus::xid_device_t::reset_base_timer()
00089 {
00090     char return_info[200];
00091     xid_con_->send_xid_command(
00092         "e1", // reset base timer Xid command
00093         2,
00094         return_info,
00095         sizeof(return_info),
00096         0);
00097 }
00098 
00099 int cedrus::xid_device_t::query_base_timer()
00100 {
00101     char return_info[200];
00102     int read = xid_con_->send_xid_command(
00103         "e3",
00104         2,
00105         return_info,
00106         sizeof(return_info),
00107         6);
00108 
00109     bool valid_response = (read == 6);
00110 
00111     if(valid_response)
00112     {
00113         union {
00114             int as_int;
00115             char as_char[4];
00116         } rt;
00117 
00118         for(int i = 0; i < 4; ++i)
00119         {
00120             rt.as_char[i] = return_info[2+i];
00121         }
00122         return rt.as_int;
00123     }
00124 
00125     return GENERAL_ERROR;
00126 }
00127 
00128 void cedrus::xid_device_t::poll_for_response()
00129 {
00130     cedrus::key_state state = xid_con_->check_for_keypress();
00131 
00132     if(state != cedrus::NO_KEY_DETECTED)
00133     {
00134         int port = -1;
00135         int key  = -1;
00136         bool was_pressed = false;
00137         int response_time = -1;
00138 
00139         xid_con_->get_current_response(port, key, was_pressed, response_time);
00140         
00141         if(config_)
00142         {
00143             key = config_->get_mapped_key(key);
00144         }
00145         else
00146         {
00147             // RB series response pads respond with a 1 based button index.  
00148             // Users of the API should expect a 0 based index.  Subtract 1 
00149             // from the key to give the user the correct button number.
00150             key -= 1;
00151         }
00152 
00153         response res;
00154         res.port = port;
00155         res.button = key;
00156         res.pressed = was_pressed;
00157         res.reaction_time = response_time;
00158         res.key_state = state;
00159  
00160         response_queue_.push(res);
00161     }
00162 }
00163 
00164 std::size_t cedrus::xid_device_t::response_queue_size() const
00165 {
00166     return response_queue_.size();
00167 }
00168 
00169 bool cedrus::xid_device_t::has_queued_responses() const
00170 {
00171     return !response_queue_.empty();
00172 }
00173 
00174 void cedrus::xid_device_t::clear_response_queue()
00175 {
00176     while(response_queue_.size() > 0)
00177     {
00178         response_queue_.pop();
00179     }
00180 }
00181 
00182 cedrus::response cedrus::xid_device_t::get_next_response()
00183 {
00184     response res = response_queue_.front();
00185     response_queue_.pop();
00186     return res;
00187 }

00204 int cedrus::xid_device_t::get_button_count() const
00205 {
00206     if(config_)
00207         return config_->number_of_lines();
00208     else
00209         return 8;
00210 }

00212 void cedrus::xid_device_t::init_device(const std::wstring &devconfig_path)
00213 {
00214     product_id_ = get_xid_inquiry("_d2",1,100,100);
00215 
00216     switch(product_id_)
00217     {
00218     case 0:
00219         device_name_ = "Cedrus Lumina LP-400 Response Pad System";
00220         input_name_prefix_ = L"Button";
00221         break;
00222     case 1:
00223         device_name_ = "Cedrus SV-1 Voice Key";
00224         input_name_prefix_ = L"Voice Response";
00225         break;
00226     case 2:
00227         {
00228             model_id_ = get_xid_inquiry("_d3", 1, 100, 100);
00229             input_name_prefix_ = L"Button";
00230             switch(model_id_)
00231             {
00232             case 1:
00233                 device_name_ = "Cedrus RB-530";
00234                 break;
00235             case 2:
00236                 device_name_ = "Cedrus RB-730";
00237                 break;
00238             case 3:
00239                 device_name_ = "Cedrus RB-830";
00240                 break;
00241             case 4:
00242                 device_name_ = "Cedrus RB-834";
00243                 break;
00244             case -99:
00245                 device_name_ = "Invalid XID Device";
00246                 break;
00247             default:
00248                 device_name_ = "Unknown Cedrus RB Series Device";
00249             }
00250             break;
00251         }
00252     case -99:
00253         device_name_ = "Invalid XID Device";
00254         input_name_prefix_ = L"Button";
00255         break;
00256     default:
00257         device_name_ = "Unknown XID device";
00258         input_name_prefix_ = L"Button";
00259         break;
00260     }
00261 
00262     if(!devconfig_path.empty())
00263     {
00264         config_ = xid_device_config_t::config_for_device(
00265           product_id_, model_id_, devconfig_path);
00266 
00267         xid_con_->set_needs_interbyte_delay(
00268             config_->needs_interbyte_delay());
00269     }
00270     else
00271     {
00272         xid_con_->set_needs_interbyte_delay(true);
00273     }
00274 }
00275 
00276 std::wstring cedrus::xid_device_t::input_name_prefix() const
00277 {
00278     return input_name_prefix_;
00279 }
